titleStmt.title: Votes and resolves of the Commons-House of Parliament Iune 15, July 13, Caroli Regis
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: Declaring House's satisfaction with apology of William Prynne for his offence in publishing his "Sundry reasons humbly tendred to the most honourable House of Peers ... against the new intended bill for governing and reforming corporations."
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
